title: Elon Musk Completes $44 Billion Deal to Own Twitter
description: The world’s richest man closed his blockbuster purchase of the social media service, thrusting Twitter into a new era.
dc:creator: Kate Conger and Lauren Hirsch
media:credit: Jason Henry for The New York Times
media:description: Mr. Musk visited Twitter’s headquarters in San Francisco on Wednesday and is expected to address employees on Friday.
